actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the Red River in Kentucky for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Provides, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, for the designation of a specified portion of the Red River in Kentucky for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to conduct a study of such river.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a certain portion of the Red River in Kentucky for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
